state_analysis: The attempts to test the RDKit import using Python 3.11 have failed repeatedly due to a shell error related to the exclamation mark in the print statement. This suggests that the terminal environment is not properly executing the command, even though the RDKit package appears to be installed.
explanation: I will escape the exclamation mark in the print statement to avoid the shell issue. I will also use an alternative method to check if RDKit can be imported successfully. After confirming that RDKit works, I will run the solution_chem_agent.py script again to verify its functionality.

commands.keystrokes: python3.11 -c "from rdkit import Chem; print('RDKit imported successfully!')"
